data.text: @SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton You promised "help is on the way" — Iranians are still waiting. Still dying. Still hoping. Don't break your promise. Deliver military support NOW. #IranMassacre #IRGCTerrorists #NoDealWithMullahs #RezaPahlaviForIran #NoDealWithIRGC  #HumanRightsIran
@SenTomCotton Amen. From NC! The Word is above all!

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The cost of inaction is measured in Iranian bodies. Every day you delay, more die. Be decisive. Push for military action. The time is NOW. #IranRevolution2026 #NoDealWithIRGC #RezaPahlaviForIran

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton The Islamic Republic cannot be negotiated with. 47 years of failed diplomacy prove it. Only force stops tyrants. Support the Iranian people with ACTION, not tweets!!. #NoDealWithMullahs #NoDealWithIRGC #IRGCTerrorists #IranRevolution2026
@SenTomCotton A lot of shitty old white men. And I’m a white man.

@SenTomCotton @SenTomCotton A free Iran = America's strongest ally in the Middle East. A free Iran = end of terrorism funding. A free Iran = regional stability. The math is simple. ACT. #IranMassacre #NoDealWithMullahs #NoDealWithIRGC #IranRevolution2026 #RezaPahlaviForIran

@SenTomCotton You guys are a farce.
You guys are Satan worshippers. 
None of you have any credibility. 
Your God is israel. 
Go fuck yourselves. https://t.co/UJrsKloSdu
